Walmart announced an agreement to buy Vizio today. Irvine, California-based Vizio is best known for lower-priced TVs, but its real value to Walmart is its advertising business and access to user … [+4849 chars]

articles.title: Signal now lets you keep your phone number private with the launch of usernames - TechCrunch
articles.description: End-to-end encrypted messaging app Signal is finally launching usernames, the company announced on Tuesday.
articles.content: Signal is launching usernames, the company announced today. Up until now, you have had to give someone your phone number to chat with them on Signal. Now you can create a unique username that you can… [+3043 chars]
